_header: Gallaunts purse penniless per vicos ecce vagrantur
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)

BLLan762.Transcription:
Galauntis purse penyles per vicos ecce vagranturyf it be as I
                    ges male solunt quod mutuantur
